text: Im running into an error when i go to reupload files to my filemanager

```nolanpierce@Nolans-Mac-mini Image Opt % npm update @HubSpot/cli 

up to date, audited 1 package in 142ms

found 0 vulnerabilities
nolanpierce@Nolans-Mac-mini Image Opt % hs filemanager upload / /
Uploading files from "/" to "/" in the File Manager of account 5098671
/usr/local/lib/node_modules/@HubSpot/cli/node_modules/@HubSpot/cli-lib/lib/read.js:20
      if (stats.isSymbolicLink()) {
                ^

TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'isSymbolicLink')
    at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/@HubSpot/cli/node_modules/@HubSpot/cli-lib/lib/read.js:20:17
    at FSReqCallback.oncomplete (node:fs:198:21)```
First ensure you're on the latest CLI version, just in-case. Rerun the command if not on the latest version.

```nolanpierce@Nolans-Mac-mini Image Opt % npm update @HubSpot/cli 

up to date, audited 1 package in 142ms

found 0 vulnerabilities```
I updated to the latest LTS of node as well.

:faceplam:  Chad I apologize i see you ran the command before trying to do anything. (I reviewed your terminal log on mobile and missed that) sorry.

I believe the issue is potentially a bug but can you do me a favor and run `hs auth` pick this specific account, and verify whether the file manager scopes are enabled?

I believe it just shows up as `files`
